name: spo-export-basic-sitecollection-info
title: Sample showing how to export basic site collection properties to a CSV file
shortDescription: Sample showing how to export basic site collection properties to a CSV file for stakeholders which do not have access to the SharePoint Admin Center
longDescription: Often we will have to provide a report containing various Site Collection properties to stakeholders which do not have access to the SharePoint Admin Center. This samples shows an export of a few basic properties but it can expanded without too much hassle.

thumbnails.alt: Preview image of the sample how to export basic site collection properties to a CSV file

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
